project.ss.engine
Interface CoreEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoreEngineImpl
public interface CoreEngine

This interface provides abstraction for production of synthesized speech for given IPA sequence. It provide two versions of speak ( ) method to do the task. Besides it various method we provide which configures the behavior of CoreEngine.
